SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreGridsButtons] ( [CoreGridsButtons_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreGrids_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_Title] varchar(100) NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_Icon] varchar(100) NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_Action] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_Order] int NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreGridsButtons_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreGridsButtons] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreGridsButtons PRIMARY KEY ([CoreGridsButtons_Ky])
